snippet: The officer, Michael Slager, charged with murder in the shooting death of a black motorist, will not be released before his trial.
abstract: Judge denies bond for white former North Charleston, SC, police officer Michael Slager, who is awaiting trial in solitary confinement on murder charges in shooting of black motorist Walter Scott.
lead_paragraph: The officer, Michael Slager, charged with murder in the shooting death of a black motorist, will not be released before his trial.

headline.main: South Carolina: Ex-Officer Denied Bond in Killing
